actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one creature,. 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Scrabble
bonus_actions.desc: Takes the Dash or Disengage action

special_abilities.name: Perfect Landing
special_abilities.desc: A scarsupial doesn't take damage from falling and is never knocked prone from falling.

special_abilities.name: Vertical Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the scarsupial moves vertically such as by falling from a tree 10 ft. towards a creature and then hits with claw attack on the same turn the target must make DC 13 Str save or be knocked prone. If the target is knocked prone the scarsupial can make a bite attack as a bonus action.
